stories.title: Emscripten – complete compiler toolchain to WebAssembly

stories.text:
If you got any feedback, we would very very much love to hear it!

- Do you like it? If yes, what do you like?

- What would you pay for in the app? (even if it's missing)

- Would you recommend this to your friends?

Short product pitch: We call it a "productivity-focused app for multitasking ninjas." It's for notes, to-do lists, meeting agendas. With no visual smog. Smarkup helps you quickly write down new ideas while letting you stay where you are. Without breaking your focus .

Power feature: Tabs!!!

Technical: It's a custom text editor with a custom CRDT collaboration engine, all from scratch. We have a Phoenix Elixir back-end system with a Postgres database.
